偽り語る: (いつわりかたる) - to speak falsely
偽る: (いつわる) - to lie; to cheat; to falsify; to deceive; to pretend
偽作: (ぎさく) - apocryphal work; forgery; spurious article
偽医者: (にせいしゃ) - quack; quack doctor; fake doctor
偽善売教: (ぎぜんばいきょう) - priestcraft (Book of Mormon)
偽善者: (ぎぜんしゃ) - hypocrite; dissembler; wolf in sheep's clothing; fox in a lamb's skin
偽妊娠: (ぎにんしん) - false pregnancy; phantom pregnancy; pseudopregnancy
偽学: (ぎがく) - false science; science out of line with the world of thought
偽小切手: (ぎこぎって) - counterfeit check (cheque); bad paper
偽性アルドステロン症: (ぎせいアルドステロンしょう) - pseudohyperaldosteronism; pseudoaldosteronism
偽悪: (ぎあく) - pretense of evil; pretence of evil
偽悪趣味: (ぎあくしゅみ) - (yoji) propensity to put oneself in as bad a light as possible; being prone to act bad
偽情報: (にせじょうほう) - disinformation; false information
偽書: (ぎしょ) - spurious letter; apocryphal book; forgery
偽札: (ぎさつ) - counterfeit paper money; forged document
偽物: (ぎぶつ) - spurious article; forgery; counterfeit; imitation; sham
偽瓢虫: (テントウムシダマシ) - handsome fungus beetle (any beetle of family Endomychidae); 28-spotted ladybird (Epilachna vigintioctopunctata)
偽称: (ぎしょう) - assuming a false name
偽経: (ぎきょう) - apocryphal sutra (composed in China or Japan)
偽者: (にせもの) - impostor; imposter; pretender; liar
偽袋鼯鼠: (ニセフクロモモンガ) - feathertail possum (Distoechurus pennatus); feather-tailed possum
偽装工作: (ぎそうこうさく) - (yoji) diversionary tactics (maneuvering); disguise; hide by camouflage
偽装爆発物: (ぎそうばくはつぶつ) - booby trap
偽装請負: (ぎそううけおい) - disguised contracting; fake subcontract; hiring a temporary employee and paying for the completion of the work rather than the work itself, thereby avoiding have to pay benefits
偽装難民: (ぎそうなんみん) - (yoji) fake (phony) refugee; illegal migrant disguised as a refugee
偽証: (ぎしょう) - false evidence; perjury; false testimony
偽証罪: (ぎしょうざい) - crime of perjury
偽証者: (ぎしょうしゃ) - perjurer; false witness
偽足: (ぎそく) - pseudopodium; pseudopod (temporary protrusion of an ameboid cell)
偽造カード: (ぎぞうカード) - forged card (e.g. cash card, credit card); counterfeit card
偽造パスポート: (ぎぞうパスポート) - fake passport; forged passport
偽造品: (ぎぞうひん) - counterfeit goods; fake; (a) forgery
偽面梟: (ニセメンフクロウ) - Oriental bay owl (Phodilus badius)
偽黒筋銀宝: (ニセクロスジギンポ) - sabre-toothed blenny (Aspidontus taeniatus)
傀儡政権: (かいらいせいけん) - (yoji) puppet government (regime)
傅く: (かしづく) - to wait upon; to serve
傍から: (そばから) - as soon as; right after
傍に置く: (わきにおく) - to lay aside; to set aside
傍ら: (katawara) - lado, borda, ao lado de, além de, próximo; enquanto (fazendo), além de, ao mesmo tempo
傍らに寄る: (かたわらによる) - to step aside
傍役: (わきやく) - supporting role (actor); minor role
傍惚れ: (おかぼれ) - unrequited love; illicit love; secret affections
傍杖: (そばづえ) - blow received by a bystander; getting dragged in to somebody else's fight
傍注: (ぼうちゅう) - marginal notes; side notes; gloss
傍濾胞細胞: (ぼうろほうさいぼう) - parafollicular cell
傍点: (ぼうてん) - marks or dots used to emphasize text passage (emphasise); marks to facilitate reading of kanbun
傍点訳者: (ぼうてんやくしゃ) - (yoji) markings put on a passage by a translator; reading(s) added by translator
傍目: (おかめ) - looking on from the side; looking on by an outsider
傍目八目: (おかめはちもく) - (yoji) bystander's vantage point/outsider's better grasp of the situation; onlookers see more of the game than the players do/people watching a game of go see 8 moves further ahead
傍系: (ぼうけい) - collateral family; subsidiary line; affiliate
傍系血族: (ぼうけいけつぞく) - collateral relation by blood
傍線: (ぼうせん) - underline; side line (equivalent to underlining in vertically written text)
傍聴: (bouchou) - listening (a uma palestra, audiência, sessão do parlamento, etc.), attending (without participating), sitting in (e.g. on a meeting), observing
傍聴人: (ぼうちょうにん) - hearer; auditor; audience
